mapper.select: select * from luckbag_info where userId=#{userId} order by createtime desc limit #{page},#{rows}
select SUM(CAST(bidtnum AS DECIMAL(10,1))),count(*) from luckbag_info where userId=#{userId}
SELECT * FROM luckbag_info WHERE UNIX_TIMESTAMP( NOW( ) ) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(createtime) >= 86400 and state=1
